casebody.data:
JOHN S. KARLS ET AL. v. CITICORP MORTGAGE COMPANY (14786)

Dupont, C. J., and Laveiy and Heiman, Js.

Submitted on briefs December 14,1995 decision released January 23,1996 *914John S. Karls, pro se, Andrea B. Karls, pro se, and Hilary M. Karls, pro se, the appellants (plaintiffs), filed a brief. Matthew D. Gordon and Brad N. Mondschein filed a brief for the appellee (defendant). PER CURIAM.

The judgment is affirmed.
